discussion.p: In , we have a definition for a manipulator named "unitbuf". Unlike other manipulators, it's not listed in synopsis. Similarly for "nounitbuf".

resolution.p: Add to the synopsis for <ios> in , after the entry for "nouppercase", the prototypes:

blockquote.pre: ios_base& unitbuf(ios_base& str); ios_base& nounitbuf(ios_base& str);
